title: Optimistic Status Updates
statement: Task status changes use optimistic updates. On drag-end, immediately update local state. Send mutation in background. On failure, revert and show error toast.
constraints: Failed mutations must revert the optimistic update within 3 seconds
verification: Simulate network failure during drag; card reverts to original column

metadata.rationale: Kanban boards feel sluggish without optimistic updates. Users expect instant visual feedback.
